website_summaries.verdict: For the sporty user with lots of stinky laundry to wash. Removes pungent odors from sweaty, musty sportswear.
pros: While this detergent is designed to tackle smelly workout clothes, it works just as well on regular clothing
Formula is low-sudsing and helps keep whites and colors from fading
Scent is gentle and not overpowering, according to reviewers

customer_reviews.title: Garbage, Do Not Buy! At least not online.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 containers because of the price. Garbage! I noticed all my whites becoming dingy during my weekly wash, I use Clorox when needed, clothes were still dingy and spots not coming out. Had to buy the regular tide to get my "clean" clothes clean.
customer_reviews.author: Skyy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing !
customer_reviews.text: Package was leaking as soon as it eas delivered and this is what I get. One of them is half empty now and the other luckily just started to leak. What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: akos balogh

customer_reviews.title: ALERT!!! SCENT CHANGED & STINKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Confirmed with Tide Customer support..they changed the smell as of April 2019. It smells so BAD now :( like a cheap mens cologne! Tide didnt even tell us or put it on the container! Bring back the old smell Tide!!! Gonna have to find a new brand and detergent because Tide has changed alot of there scents and not for the better!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: My favorite is Tide
customer_reviews.text: Love Tide HE, use very little and even the dirtiest clothes come out clean
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Broitzman

customer_reviews.title: Clean & Soft Clothes That Smell Great
customer_reviews.text: I think Tide is a good detergent, but way overpriced, so I never buy it. I don't even like the way regular Tide smells. But this was on sale & I figured I'd give it a try because I like April Fresh scent & the added Downy sounded good. Love this stuff. Does a good job cleaning, you don't need much, smells fantastic without being overpowering and my clothes are soft out of the dryer, no dryer sheets needed. Now it's the only detergent I want.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: The rest of the order was great and didn't get any of the spilled soap
customer_reviews.text: Tide Original Scent HE Turbo Clean Liquid Laundry Detergent, 50 Fl Oz (32 Loads), (Pack Of 2) One of the bottles came half full, it leaked to its own box. The rest of the order was great and didn't get any of the spilled soap.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Zambrano

customer_reviews.title: Really got my clothes cleaner than pods...
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought these to try as part of my Prime Pantry box. I have been using pods, but couldn’t beat the deal at the time for price so I tried it. Since I do laundry just about everyday, I do not have a HE machine BUT... I found this HE brand to work very well in my traditional washer. I may not go back to pods and this smelled great even though it was just the plain regular scent. My clothes looked and smelled cleaner than with Tide pods. Try it for yourself, you may not go back either!
customer_reviews.author: EJane

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging and shipping caused loss of product
customer_reviews.text: I love this laundry soap and will continue to buy it, but probably not from Amazon Pantry. Neither bottle was closed all the way or taped shut. They leaked and create a big mess. I lost a lot of the liquid. Not a great first experience.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great for smelly clothes
customer_reviews.text: Sport wash detergent is necessary to get the stink out of workout clothes, things that have been sitting in the laundry hamper for too long, and generally anything else that just stinks. This stuff seems to work better than regular tide on super smelly clothes. Definitely recommend it for an active family or one who just lets laundry sit around for too long without washing.
customer_reviews.author: McClory Family

customer_reviews.title: best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Now how can anyone beat Tide really. As far as i am concerned I have used tide for 50 years I won't change now. Oh, i have tried a few others but, I always go back to tide. I really like the liquid tide because, I can use it as a stain buster as well. I just poor a little on a stain let it stand a few minutes while the washer fills up. Throw it into the washer and stain is usually gone when the wash is over. Saves money because, you don't need to purchase a separate stain remover.
customer_reviews.author: B. ColemanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: By by stinky gym clothes smell
customer_reviews.text: I had recently purchased another gym clothes detergent (win), for more money. It wasn't great. I love this one. I've had some of my workout clothes for 7+years now, and they were getting stinky. Regular detergent and downey weren't cutting it. So far so good. My clothes come out smelling like febreeze instead of the weird smell from before. Definitely buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Lily_S

customer_reviews.title: I do like the prices for two for the price of one
customer_reviews.text: These tide liquid detergent does the job and are small. I do like the prices for two for the price of one. I like the quality it left my clothes feeling fresh and clean. Highly recommend! And FAST SHIPPING!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Cazandra

customer_reviews.title: Everything else in my order was good. So now what
customer_reviews.text: I was supposed to receive 2 50 oz bottles of tide. I got 2 32 ox bottles. Everything else in my order was good. So now what??
customer_reviews.author: David Grammer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your clothes smelling awful!
customer_reviews.text: This leaves your close with a ammonia smell and if you use fabric softener your clothes will smell even worse. I could not wait to be rid of this detergent. I actually resorted to washing my clothes with my baby's detergent because the smell was awful. It gets your clothes clean but the smell it leaves behind is very undesirable. I'm not kidding about the ammonia after smell, it's very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Conner

customer_reviews.title: One of the bottles leaked.
customer_reviews.text: As nice is it is to have laundry detergent delivered right to your house, there was a small leak and I got a double order because I just didn't realize it was two bottles per order. The bottles were a little smaller than I anticipated even though I thought I read it carefully. either way used it all up.
customer_reviews.author: S. GarrettTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The small sizes are always available which is not the case at the grocery stores.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Prefer liquid detergent over powder detergent. I want something that will clean the sheets, towels and clothes without leaving any perfume smell and rinse easily. We do a double rinse with cold H20. I can wash our dogs' blankets with this detergent, get them clean and rinse out the residue completely. The dogs seem to love these clean blankets too. So many other detergents are harsh on the skin, human and dog, not a problem with Tide Gentle.
customer_reviews.author: A. L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for workout clothes
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about you, but my workout clothes get very stinky. Once I discovered this detergent, my problems were solved. It is pretty heavily scented, but it helps eliminate sweat odor. I keep my sweaty workout clothes separate from my regular clothes and use this detergent on that load. It works well and doesn't seem to degrade any of my dry-fit clothing material.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Brooks

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: In a family of mostly guys living in the desert southwest, we generate some pretty smelly laundry. Tide is wonderful - we've used it for years - and this sport scent is invigorating. Our laundry smells clean, not like it should be run through the wash a second time, which has happened with other brands. We'll stick with Tide!
customer_reviews.author: JylM

customer_reviews.title: Best detergent we've used
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as part of my prime pantry order. They're smaller bottles than what I imagined from the Fl Oz. description, but other than that, I'm very happy with the product itself. IMO, it's the best detergent we've used and when you don't have to use as much, compared to other cheaper brands, you're not really spending that much more per load.
customer_reviews.author: Amarylis

customer_reviews.title: I love the smell of this laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: Tide has always worked well on my clothes, and I love the smell of this Febreeze Sport detergent. It gets rid of stinky smells and replaces them with a really nice scent. And, of course, you get that good Tide clean!
customer_reviews.author: Corsair174

customer_reviews.title: FOOLED
customer_reviews.text: Don't get fooled like me. Each bottle does NOT do 64 loads. The blue block should not be appearing as if it's on the bottle. These are two 32 load bottles which makes an outrageous price and quite deceitful. I may be done with AMAZON. As a disabled vet, I'm not carrying these to the back of a KOHL's. They got me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Detergent By Far
customer_reviews.text: In terms of cleaning power and scent. this is the best detergent by far. I've been using Tide + Febreeze Sport for a few years now since a friend of mine showed it to me and I'll never go back to another detergent. I've had no issues with skin irritation and I have decently sensitive skin. Price point here is along the same as local stores. Would definitely recommend and will be buying again when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Rhushi

customer_reviews.title: The Best Laundry Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used many different brands of laundry detergent and Tide is the best at getting stains out. My husband spilled Alfredo sauce that spilled out of to go container. It was dark so he didn’t see it leaking so the oily creamy sauce got all over his new cotton sweater and his khaki pants. We put them in the wash with Tide and both came out spotless. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMistress

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I like tide ever since. Arrived on time & intact. Good product. Highly recommended u will not regret buying tide.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan and Gracia

customer_reviews.title: but if you want detergent that smells really good this one doesn't give any smell at all to ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely free and gentle, but if you want detergent that smells really good this one doesn't give any smell at all to your clothes. I suppose that's part of it's purpose. It cleans well, but I'll be using some tide packs for clothes I want to smell good. On another note: I was anything for my dog with this and she's less inclined to destroy the item later.
customer_reviews.author: Xeek

customer_reviews.title: Smaller bottles than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Like the Sport scent, but was a bit disappointed in the size of the bottle. For some reason I was thinking I was ordering large bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Got This Gift

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this tide. I normally would just get detergent when it’s on sale at my job but this one right here was cheaper and had more loads than the store would sell it for. Read comments that people said it came opened and spilled everywhere. Not mine! Came with a sticker around the cap so it couldn’t be turned and everything was in tact. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: irocklocsz

customer_reviews.title: Smells different that usual - not happy
customer_reviews.text: So this is the 2nd time I’ve purchased this from amazon because the price I right... well the scent of the second set I got is NOT the same smell. It’s to strong and perfume smelling. I hate it. Although I use to LOvE and only buy this scent elsewhere. I’m so frustrated.. did the formula change?!
customer_reviews.author: BSellers

customer_reviews.title: Warning may make clothes soft and brighter than usual
customer_reviews.text: we all just love tide and its power for cleaning abilities I've been using this ever since I've seen my mother use it this is a great product at a great price and smells wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Supernovaink

customer_reviews.title: I liked that I could purchase the twin pack of the ...
customer_reviews.text: As a frequent Tide Free user due to skin allergies, I liked that I could purchase the twin pack of the smaller jugs for a bit cheaper price than the full size jug. The smaller jugs are great for storing in small laundry room cabinets and easier to lift and pour into the washer without the risk of over pouring or spilling.
customer_reviews.author: Cheese and PackersTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic unscented but not strong cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is odorless. It is truly wonderful! But like most detergents with or without perfume, this just doesn't clean very well. It doesn't get out the smell of food oils if you've been cooking in the kitchen and your clothes absorb the oil, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Endives

customer_reviews.title: Product performs as expected : good.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping of 2 jugs was poor. No protective tape or sealant around jug cup. No extra care taken to prevent leakage of the jouble cartonugs. no protective steps taken to prevent leakage of which there was sufficent. The driver or his/her company made no ccomment on this.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Tide 2 - 46oz bottles
customer_reviews.text: The 2 Tide Febreze Sport Odor Defense 46 fl. oz bottles were smaller than I thought. I only bought them because I wanted to try out the Amazon Prime Pantry. I paid $13.99 for the 2 bottles, and could've gotten them cheaper at my nearest box store. I did like the fact I didn't have to leave my house to shop for these items. And I love Tide products, and this scent is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Cwissy

customer_reviews.title: keeps clothes smelling good
customer_reviews.text: Best sport laundry detergent there is. Between running, hiking, and HIIT gym workouts, my clothes get gross. I have been using this stuff for years, and it has kept some of my favorite pieces smelling normal long after the compression has worn out.
customer_reviews.author: rSquare

customer_reviews.title: I only buy this scent
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every scent of laundry detergent out there and this one seems to be just right. The scent is not overpowering and doesn't linger for too long, but it's there just enough to let you know that the clothes are clean. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: DrK

customer_reviews.title: Leaking all over!
customer_reviews.text: These were together in a small box inside a large box, I can't say much for the quality of the product yet but I wasn't very happy when I seen about 1/3 of one leaked out into the box and covered everything else I ordered. The other bottles handle was pretty beat up too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive, in comparison to my regular store
customer_reviews.text: I like the product very much, what I don’t like is the price, I should have read instead of just look at the pictures. I could have done so much better if I purchased this at the super market. I got to very small bottles for $23. I don’t think I would purchase at pantry anymore
customer_reviews.author: maria frances

customer_reviews.title: Fabric Softener is Weak
customer_reviews.text: I believe Tide changed the formula with this product, the fabric softener is not working as well. Left clothes with major static cling, and not as soft as previously.
customer_reviews.author: MaryMary sometimescontrary

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love Tide Free and Gentle. The lack of scent and other irritants make it perfect for people with sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Stepan

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love Tide but I feel like there was a lot of wasted plastic in this order. I wish I could've just purchased a bigger bottle through Amazon rather than having to buy the two pack with all the wasted plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a$$ before and after you wash your clothes.
customer_reviews.text: This is the Sport scent version of the product. It smells horrible when opening it up, like two nuns bumping uglies while a bum dips his sac into the mix. If i were you i would social distance myself from this product or from the buyer who may of spiked the detergent to begin with! Side NOTE. I would rather wash my clothes in diarrhea than dry them with Osama's fumanda cheese than buy this crap again. Stupid Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Hee Haw

customer_reviews.title: Just about same price as BIG BOX Member stores...
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy in 200 oz & lasts me over a year, but it sits around in the way - about half the price at 100 oz, and since they closed my BIG BOX Member store - I have to go out of my way or when I am around one - NO RUNNING OUT NOW!!! Thanks Prime Pantry!
customer_reviews.author: br_549

customer_reviews.title: No HE label on product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two bottles because your description stated it is for HE washers. There’s no label on the bottle stating that when I received my purchase. Should it not have the HE symbol on it like most standard HE laundry bottles?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used for 65 years
customer_reviews.text: I am a senior citizen and my mother used Tide and I have used it all my life. It is the best on the market. Check Consumer's Reports.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Shearer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite laundry detergent. After I switched to this detergent I noticed that I wasn't breaking out as often and I love that there is not a fragrance. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie F.

customer_reviews.title: Rip off.
customer_reviews.text: When looking at the picture it leads you to believe you are getting two bottles of the 64 load soap.... not the case. They are the 32 loads and therefore not a good deal. I feel ripped off and I can’t even return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amandah987

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: It's Tide what can I say does the job I have a small portable washing machine so with the addition of the Downey in it makes it easier, so it cleans nicely with the addition of the fabric softener. Plus it smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell
customer_reviews.text: I love original ride but this stuff is amazing I mix original ride with this cause the wife thinks it's to strong but together she likes it if you work outside in the heat this is for you
customer_reviews.author: Hoyt3417

customer_reviews.title: Worded well for my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I’d been having mild sensitive skin responses to other detergents. I tried this out along with an other all natural detergent. I alternate between the two bc I feel my clothing seeming cleaner with Tide. For me, this worked well after discovering my sensitive skin responses.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Lid loose soap missing
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent since I have sensitive skin and do not like too much scent. However, I was not very happy how it arrived. One of the lids was not tight and at least a quarter of the container leaked. I have ordered my Tide this way before, unsure about doing it again!
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: Good for spot & pre-treating
customer_reviews.text: I prefer Free & Clear type detergents because our family has a lot of sensitive skin issues/allergies. Never had a problem with this brand. Good for spot & pre-treating, too. *Just make sure you buy the right one for your machine (ie. HE vs regular).* Not always priced affordably or readily available at stores, but found it to be the best bargain through Amazon Pantry.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.G.T.

customer_reviews.title: Worth Loyalty
customer_reviews.text: I will not waste my money buying anything else. My mother used Tide my entire childhood. I've used it my entire adult life. I'm hyper-sensitive to dyes and fragrances. For whatever reason, Tide does not cause me to break out or itch or even sneeze.
customer_reviews.author: Meg L.

customer_reviews.title: Tide Sport strong smell
customer_reviews.text: Tide Sport with Febreeze works great to get out the smells that normal detergent doesn’t get out but it has a very strong perfume smell so I don’t use it every load
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my front load HE washer. I have noticed a big difference in how clean my clothes are getting vs. when I used regular liquid detergent. I would definitely buy again. However, its much cheaper in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: KatelynTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product and scent for years- love it!
customer_reviews.author: E. Voight

customer_reviews.title: Spendy, cheaper in store!
customer_reviews.text: I read this wrong... thought it was 50 ml for each bottle & thought this was an amazing find, to my surprise it was 50ml total. They are perfect size to refill though when traveling or when you have to carry along to the laundry mat. PROS: just a bit bigger than travel size which is helpful for easy & light carrying. CONS: wasn't as expected
customer_reviews.author: Chintana Owens

customer_reviews.title: It Cleans Well.
customer_reviews.text: It is the laundry detg I always use. Works well in all laundry situations. I don't care much about scent, don't have sensitive skin, and never knew detergent could get stale.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Odor Free. That's All I Ask.
customer_reviews.text: We've been using Tide Free for years, and recently purchased using Prime Pantry. I'm allergic to perfumes, colognes, etc., and this laundry detergent is what works best for me. It also gets the clothes clean ... which is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Good size and quality
customer_reviews.text: The original scent, we love the size, handle and cup that come with it, all easy to use. We wanted regular detergent, no added bleach or helping agents, just regular good working, which this is for our family
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Spilled and small in size
customer_reviews.text: Spiled in shipping. Lid most have not been tight. Box had soap all in side it. I took photo but phone won't let me upload. I also thought they where to large size. 😑😢
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicer marketing
customer_reviews.text: We love this product in my house. Not sure if it’s exactly better, I admit I’m lazy to check the ingredients and toxic levels. I’m sure it’s toxic to some degree. But the packaging and marketing is pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Vivienne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my new washer
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and I love Tide Free! Very glad to find in HE for my new washer/dryer set and at a good price. (The 5 stars I gave this on scent means there IS NO scent- exactly what I was looking for)
customer_reviews.author: Becca Radtke

customer_reviews.title: Check Your Labels
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, but be careful. If you have certain performance sports clothing, the Febreze in this detergent will not be good for those items. Check your labels. If this isn't an issue, it does a pretty good job.
customer_reviews.author: Mahatma Head

customer_reviews.title: It’s Tide! Th
customer_reviews.text: The bottles were smaller then expected but it’s Tide which IMO is a great product. It’s excellent on sensitive skin! No smell what so ever. 🥰😍🥰
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for People with Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: My family has been using Tide Free and Gentle for years. We no longer have to deal with getting rashes from using regular Tide. Tide Free and Gentle is great for people with sensitive skin or who are sensitive to smells. Your clothes get clean. In high school, my chemistry class did a lab on which laundry detergent cleaned the best and guess who win; Tide. Watch for sales to buy Tide Free and Gentle. Amazon has some good deals throughout the year. I recommend stocking up when on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Beech

customer_reviews.title: Only the best!
customer_reviews.text: Classic Original Tide. The distinct clean smell brings so many memories to mind. I came from a Tide family so this particular detergent does not irritate my skin at all. I also use it for my little one and have yet to have any issues. The packaging is compact and small but that doesn't mean that any less punch - you simply use less to get that same great clean!
customer_reviews.author: Alison O

customer_reviews.title: Still causes me to itch after a couple of uses
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and tide has always made my skin itch and this Free and clear edition was no exception. Not sure what it is about tide that makes me itch like crazy but Arm and Hammer sensitive skin or Dreft never causes an issue. I use Arm and Hammer because exclusively now. Gave the two bottles of this Tide away to Goodwill. Two stars because it cleans well at least.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Not hard to pick up and use. Works great on clothes
customer_reviews.text: My favorite. I'm old and these smaller containers are easy for me to use. But then all the time. Amazon delivers all our heavy to bring home products. So handy!
customer_reviews.author: Dutches

customer_reviews.title: Works well and love the two pack. Easier to have delivered for disabled person like myself.
customer_reviews.text: Has little to no scent as expected for jerkiness and dye free product. Only washing detergent I can use without breaking out in an itchy rash.
customer_reviews.author: Shann

customer_reviews.title: Leaky Product
customer_reviews.text: A quarter of one of the bottles of detergent leaked over the rest of the content of the delivery. What a mess! It took me a half hour to clean the other products and I was left with less than I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I like it and bought cause this is the soap my ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it and bought cause this is the soap my Mom always used. My daughter ended up needing soap after I had used a few times so I gave it to her. I use All laundry soap and its about the same as this. I was looking for a laundry soap that would suds up more. None I use anymore do. But my clothes get clean so guess they are still working good.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalund

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: It would of got a 5 star if the lid wouldnt of been leaking when I got it it got all over my dryer sheets but other than that great price for the amount you get just wish they would of made sure the tape around the lid was 100% secured
customer_reviews.author: Brandytaylor2232

customer_reviews.title: smells great, cleans oh so good.
customer_reviews.text: This high efficiency Tide laundry detergent works great. My clothes smell fresh and come out looking super clean. I don't have to use much with my high efficiency washer. I actually use a lot less than what the directions on the bottle say to use. It is very concentrated. I paid full price for this and although it's more expensive than other detergents, it is totally worth it, plus it will last a long time if you have a HE washer.
customer_reviews.author: LorineKnowsReviews

customer_reviews.title: You don't receive what is advertised
customer_reviews.text: I received two 32 oz bottles instead of the advertised two 50 oz bottles. Very disappointed and highly overpriced. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: doreen m sangalli

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well, no smell
customer_reviews.text: I like the scent free, colour free Tide. Cleans without a smell left on the fabric. Excellent for people with skin sensitivity. It's not the HE high efficiency one which is perfect because I don't have a HE washer.
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Tuff on stains
customer_reviews.text: I use tide products to clean my clothes, both regular and work clothes ( I work in construction) and it leaves my clothes smelling great. It’s also tuff on grease stains.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Perez

customer_reviews.title: Keeps clothes clean without shrinking them
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is specifically advertised for cold water wash. I never use anything but cold for years now since it shrinks my clothes if I don't use it. I have no idea if anything is actually special about the cold water tide, but it gives you the warm and fuzzy that it will help. My clothes come out smelling clean and fresh. The colors do fade over time, but by the time the color is real bad the fabric is fading away anyway and it's time for new clothes.
customer_reviews.author: B King

customer_reviews.title: Better for baby's sensitive skin than Dreft
customer_reviews.text: Only laundry detergent that does not cause my son's skin to break out. He has very sensitive skin. So even Dreft would cause reactions in his skin. My son is 10mos old and had a minor case of baby eczema the first few months of his life. Now, it's all cleared up. I had a coupon for Dreft, tried it for one load of his laundry, and it caused his eczema to flair up. Switched back to this product and it went away. I won't go back to Dreft, as it has perfumes/dyes in it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sphinx

customer_reviews.title: Could smell this all day
customer_reviews.text: Ive always been a Tide fan. It smells great, my clothes come out super clean, the nozzle makes it super easy to pour. It's just a great product all around.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: College Student Approved
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my college student. Makes life easier and you only have to bring down one bottle with your dirty laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Mailander

customer_reviews.title: Nice Scent but Strong
customer_reviews.text: This detergent owns a very good capability of cleaning. I suggest you not to put too much detergent. The scent is nice; a caveat is that the scent is strong and long-lasting. I underestimate the statement "Sport Active Fresh Scent". Overall, it is a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Youzhi

customer_reviews.title: Alittle goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: Last for quite some time. Clothes come out bright and clean if used as directed
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Canty

customer_reviews.title: Best laundry soap for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I always use Tide Free for laundry. I'm allergic to most laundry soap. Never have a problem using Tide Free, and my clothes are always fresh and clean. I never use any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Tide detergent for years. I like the way it takes stains out of clothes and the fresh smell that leave on them.
customer_reviews.author: Maria E Aramendia

customer_reviews.title: Allergy friendly
customer_reviews.text: The lack of scent allows me to use the detergent without assaulting my senses and without my skin reacting when in contact with the laundered clothes. Washes well. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Delivered to door
customer_reviews.text: I can’t go out to shop and even so, too heavy to being in. Amazon is a god send for the elderly.
customer_reviews.author: roostershill

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite detergent. Please keep carrying it at a reasonable and affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: Tide free & clear
customer_reviews.text: Did not have to go to store, “over 65, stay at home”. Wonderful product that I was able to have delivered. Terrific process. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Fresh scent and it lasted for a long time when i got the two of them. Still one left. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Runa S.

customer_reviews.title: Tide Means Clean
customer_reviews.text: P&G's Tide has been about the best liquid detergent for a decade. It gets my clothes clean without making colors fade. BE CAREFUL. The stuff with "bleach alternative" makes sweat stains purple and P&G won't admit it. Other than that version, I've never had trouble with Tide. It works and works.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Myers

customer_reviews.title: Completely crushed
customer_reviews.text: I love tide but the box was completely crushed and it all spilled out because it wasn’t packed right!
customer_reviews.author: Branwyn Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Competitive price!
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the competitive price but I mostly love the size, not so heavy that I can't pull it off the shelf and great size to store in the small laundry room that we have. The detergent keeps your clothes smelling good and clean. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: E's Mom

customer_reviews.title: great detergent
customer_reviews.text: this detergent is great.No scent ,gets cloths clean and helps with my sensitive skin issue.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great product 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: You will get two 50 OZ (1.47L) bottles. Same cleaning power but without any perfume. Works great in HE machines.
customer_reviews.author: Moon

customer_reviews.title: If I could marry Amazon Prime, I would
customer_reviews.text: The two-day free shipping on this made my daily life in college so much easier. I didn't have to worry about whom I had to ask for a ride to the store when I realized I was close to running out of detergent. Cue Amazon Prime to the rescue. For $11 or so I was stocked with two energy efficient Tide bottles. Makes you wonder why people even allow themselves to be ripped off by Target or Walmart or any of the corporate giants that play the middle men in our daily consumption of products when you can literally just hop onto Amazon, wait a day or so and BAM. Money saved.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rhoad

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the only tide I use now, gets everything out and smells fantastic. Price here isn't great but product is outstanding
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent and works well in our HE washer
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent and works well in our HE washer. We have found we can use even less of this product than the washer calls for and still get clean clothes with a good scent using cold water.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I can only use tide as my husband has very sensitive skin to any other detergent. I love the price through amazon! & it’s so nice to have it delivered to my door in two days!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Liquid spill
customer_reviews.text: I use this product but when it arrived it had spilled out of the box. in the future, i will avoid ordering liquids to be mailed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: No fun to buy, but it's something ya gotta do once in a while. At least you are getting a good product for a good price, brought right to your door. Can't beat a deal like that
customer_reviews.author: sam

product_meta.title: Tide Laundry Detergent Liquid Plus Febreze Sport Active Fresh Scent, HE Turbo Clean, 46 oz, 29 Loads - 2-pack (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description:
Tide Plus Febreze Sport Active Fresh HE Turbo Clean Laundry Detergent offers the brilliant clean you know and love plus even better tough odor removal 
(1). It delivers a deep-down clean that helps fight sports odors, especially sweat, while leaving behind the fresh scent of Febreze. It is formulated with HE Turbo Clean technology for 6x the cleaning power in half the time 
(2) and is recommended by leading high efficiency washing machine manufacturers 
(3). Unlike many HE compatible laundry detergents that can slow machines down with over-sudsing, this turbo-charged formula quickly collapses suds and targets tough stains. 


Try Tide PODS Plus Febreze with 4-in-1 chamber technology that cleans, protects colors, fights stains and provides 24-hour freshness.
(1) vs. Tide Original 
(2) Based on stain removal using 1 dose Tide HE in the quick wash cycle vs. 6 doses of the leading bargain liquid detergent, base variant, in a normal wash cycle
(3) Based on co-marketing agreements






PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Package Dimensions :11.18 x 7.76 x 6.65 inches; 2.88 Pounds
 * Date First Available :July 9, 2014
 * Manufacturer :P&G
 * ASIN :B00LN22L7E

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars5,321 ratings

(3). Unlike many HE compatible laundry detergents that can slow machines down with over-sudsing, this turbo-charged formula quickly collapses suds and targets tough stains. 


Try Tide PODS Plus Febreze with 4-in-1 chamber technology that cleans, protects colors, fights stains and provides 24-hour freshness.

(3) Based on co-marketing agreements

Tide Plus Febreze Freshness Sport Active offers more of odor fighting power you love, with a deeper clean vs. Tide Original.
Amazing Tide clean from America’s #1 detergent based on sales

Part of the trusted Tide Plus Collection
